self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes believes he has significantly improved his back pressure, riser, and pronation over the past two years and is confident he can beat Levan. He mentions that Levan is in his best shape but still thinks he can win.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Very strong, especially with back pressure and belly curls
Levan Saginashvili.health: In best shape of his life
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Levan underestimated Ermes last time, but now he is taking him more seriously.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes thinks it will be a very close fight. He mentions that Kurdecha has destroyed Devon in practice matches but acknowledges Devon's strong defensive position. He believes Kurdecha can win if he has a good press.

Devon Larratt.strength: Super good defensive position, strong pronation and riser
Devon Larratt.health: Old and injured but still strong
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon is experienced but has damage on his arm from years of arm wrestling.

Alex Kurdecha.previous_match_summary: Kurdecha has performed well in practice matches against Devon.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes initially predicted a 70-30 win for Georgii but later acknowledged Michael's strength and endurance. He mentioned that Michael didn't want to go to the strap and had a strong grip.

Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: Michael has faced strong opponents like Vitaly and has a unique style.

Georgii Dzeranov.previous_match_summary: Georgii struggled against Michael's dragging technique.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin believes the match will be incredible and highlights Ermes' confidence and mindset. He does not predict a winner but emphasizes the importance of the match.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Improved back pressure, riser, and pronation
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes has shown significant improvement over the past two years.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Very strong, especially with back pressure
Levan Saginashvili.health: In best shape of his life
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Levan is taking Ermes more seriously this time.
